findings.title: Deployer can set fees up to 25%
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to set fees up to a maximum of 25%, which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can burn tokens from address if allowance is permitted
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to burn tokens from an address if allowance is granted.

findings.title: Deployer cannot pause contract
findings.description: The deployer does not have the capability to pause the contract.

findings.title: Deployer cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The deployer of the contract loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.
